isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 2000 SERIES MUD GUARDS

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Rear Mud Guard (Original Hood) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT AND HEX LOCK NUT (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: Remove the hex bolts and hex lock nuts (Item 1) securing the mud guard (Item 2) and reinforcement (Item 3) to the mud guard bracket (Item 4). Remove the mud guard and reinforcement from the mud guard bracket, passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side mud guard and reinforcement.

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Rear Mud Guard (Original Hood) - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the mud guard (Item 2) and reinforcement (Item 3) on forward side of the mud guard bracket (Item 4) and install the hex bolts (Item 1) through the mud guard bracket, mud guard and reinforcement. Then install hex lock nuts (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 125 to 140 in-lbs. (14 to 16 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install driver side mud guard and reinforcement.

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Only-Outer Edge Fender and Fender Extension Mud Guard (Original Hood) - Remove

step1.para: Remove the hex bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts ( Item 1, Figure 50) and remove the mud guard ( Item 2, Figure 50) from the outer edge of the hood/ fender assembly ( Item 3, Figure 50), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 50. 2600 Model Only - Fender Outer Edge Mud Guard

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side mud guard from outer edge of hood/fender assembly.

Remove the hex bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts ( Item 1, Figure 51) and remove the mud guard ( Item 2, Figure 51) from the outer edge of the fender extension ( Item 3, Figure 51), passenger side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 51. 2600 Model Only - Fender Extension Outer Edge Mud Guard

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side mud guard from outer edge of fender extension.

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Only-Outer Edge Fender and Fender Extension Mud Guard (Original Hood) - Install

step1.para: Position the mud guard ( Item 2, Figure 50) on the outer edge of the hood/fender assembly ( Item 3, Figure 50) and install the hex bolts with flat washers ( Item 1, Figure 50) through the mud guard and hood/fender assembly. Then install hex lock nuts with flat washers ( Item 1, Figure 50), driver side shown. Tighten to 125 to 140 in-lbs. (14 to 16 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side mud guard on the outer edge of the hood/fender assembly.

Position the mud guard ( Item 2, Figure 51) on the outer edge of the fender extension ( Item 3, Figure 51) and install the hex bolts with flat washers ( Item 1, Figure 51) through the mud guard and fender extension. Then install hex lock nuts with flat washers ( Item 1, Figure 51), passenger side shown. Tighten to 125 to 140 in-lbs. (14 to 16 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install driver side mud guard on the outer edge of the fender extension.

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Rear Mud Guard (Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 52 for items in parentheses.

figure.caption: Figure 52. 2600 Model Mud Guards (Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996)

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT AND FLAT WASHER (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: Remove the hex bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Items 1 and 2) securing the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) to the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 5). Remove the mud guard and reinforcement, passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side mud guard and reinforcement.

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Rear Mud Guard (Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996) - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 52 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) on the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 5) and install the hex bolts with flat washers (Item 1) through the fender extension, mud guard and reinforcement. Then install hex lock nuts (Item 2), passenger side shown. Tighten to 125 to 140 in-lbs. (14 to 16 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install driver side mud guard and reinforcement.
